body_text: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Taiwan-based recording company This article needs additional citations for verification . Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources . Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. Find sources: "B'in Music" – news · newspapers · books · scholar · JSTOR ( April 2023 ) ( Learn how and when to remove this message ) B'in Music , otherwise known as Believe in Music International Limited ( Chinese : 相信音樂國際股份有限公司 ) in full or B'in Music ( 相信音樂 ), [ 1 ] is a Taiwan-based recording company, formally established on July 1, 2006, and founded by Ason Chen in Taipei. [ 2 ] Current artist roster [ edit ] B’in Music [ edit ] Male artists Jonathan Lee Li Jianqing Xiao Bing Chih GBOYSWAG HUSH Female artists Rene Liu Jia Jia Ding Dang Ann Bai Tarcy Su Groups Mayday Cosmos People Accusefive Energy Tizzy Bac Mixer Fool and Idiot iBeams [ edit ] Male artists Ezu Huang Ray Huang Female artists Ring Arrow Wei Fran List of record labels www.bin-music.com.tw www.binmusic.ir B'in Music on Facebook This article about a Taiwanese corporation or company is a stub .
